rows.label: qev091801_MSG0001
rows.name: ...Yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Come with us.
We'd like to question you about some homicides.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_JNK0010
rows.name: Moan

rows.label: qev091801_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell the Murderess you knew it would come to this.

rows.label: qev091801_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev091801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if the Murderess is being formally charged.

rows.label: qev091801_JNK0030
rows.name: Confess

rows.label: qev091801_SEL0031
rows.name: Break down and admit that you did it.

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0003
rows.name: Ugh, please. Can you not IMMEDIATELY jump to conclusions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0004
rows.name: I haven't killed anybody...yet. Look, what's going on here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0005
rows.name: Wow, keeping your cool. I'm impressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0006
rows.name: But random accusations piss me off, so start talking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0007
rows.name:
Er, I wasn't speaking to you.
Our suspect is the Murderess here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0008
rows.name: Me? Widdle old me? Oh come on, that's ridiculous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0009
rows.name: We have eight homicide victims, all of them BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0010
rows.name: BLADEs? Which ones?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0011
rows.name: Otis. Yolanda. Six others. Names ring any bells?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0012
rows.name: ...Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0013
rows.name: Damn. They were lowlifes, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0014
rows.name:
All the deceased share a common trait—
they all worked with you at some point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0015
rows.name:
Folks claim you're grabby with mission rewards.
We have a stack of such complaints.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0016
rows.name:
We also hear that you once shot someone
in the back during a mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0017
rows.name: It's reasonable to think all that earned you a few enemies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0018
rows.name: And then there's the whole "Murderess" alias you go by.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0019
rows.name: So yeah, we're suspicious. And more than a little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_JNK0040
rows.name: Argue

rows.label: qev091801_SEL0041
rows.name: Claim that a Definian must be behind it, like with Hope.

rows.label: qev091801_JNK0050
rows.name: Defend

rows.label: qev091801_SEL0051
rows.name:
Say that the Murderess would
never do something like that.

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0020
rows.name: Yeah, that does seem likely, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0021
rows.name: It's a possibility we're pursuing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0022
rows.name: But we still think it's best if we asked you a few questions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0023
rows.name: Fair enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0024
rows.name: Thanks for the vote of confidence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0025
rows.name: As for you, I've got reasons for my title. Personal ones.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0026
rows.name:
And what kind of genius thinks a serial killer
would announce that fact, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0027
rows.name: All right. I'll ignore the moniker for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0028
rows.name: That doesn't change what's in your file, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0029
rows.name: Fair enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0030
rows.name: Then if you'll please follow me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0031
rows.name: Hold it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0032
rows.name:
Sure, the Murderess will rob you blind,
and she's a generally horrible person—[ST:page p1=120 ]but there's no way she killed those people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0033
rows.name:
That would mean giving up on her dream,
and we all know she'd never do that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0034
rows.name: Irina?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0035
rows.name:
I understand your concerns.
Again, we're simply taking her in for questioning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0036
rows.name: But she's got enemies everywhere, especially in the top brass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0037
rows.name:
Who's to say she won't be given
a permanent residence in the brig?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0038
rows.name:
So you want us to ignore a suspect?
What happens when another BLADE dies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_JNK0060
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev091801_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell the officer that he needs to build a stronger case.

rows.label: qev091801_JNK0070
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev091801_SEL0071
rows.name: Offer to find the real killer yourself.

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0039
rows.name: Exactly. You don't have the evidence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0040
rows.name:
These types of random interrogations
can easily turn into witch hunts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0041
rows.name: Then we're at an impasse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0042
rows.name: Not if we go catch the real murderer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0043_m
rows.name: Boom. Perfect. Hell, we can even look for him together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0043_f
rows.name: Boom. Perfect. Hell, we can even look for him together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0044
rows.name: I owe Yolanda and the others that much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0045
rows.name: Now just a minute! I can't let a suspect waltz off and start—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0046
rows.name: What's the problem? You've got Irina.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0047
rows.name: Huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0048
rows.name: Oh, I see. You mean you want ME to go find the killer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0049
rows.name: All right. I'll do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0050
rows.name: Please, kitten. That isn't even funny.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0051
rows.name: You're staying here as collateral.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0052
rows.name:
Then if I run, Officer Friendly here
can throw you in prison forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0053
rows.name: What?! I do NOT remember agreeing to that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0054
rows.name: You believe I'm innocent, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0055
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0056_m
rows.name:
I MIGHT believe you.
But I guess if he goes along, it'll be okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0056_f
rows.name:
I MIGHT believe you.
But I guess if she goes along, it'll be okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0057
rows.name:
So there you go.
We'll go find the perp and be home for dinner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0058
rows.name: Let's go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091801_MSG0058_2
rows.name: We need information. Let's start by hitting up Eleonora.[ST:wait ]
